question: Average monthly trading volume of NASDAQ, S&P 500, Dow Jones
query: SELECT    DATE_TRUNC('month', date) AS month,   stock_index,   AVG(trading_volume) AS avg_monthly_trading_volume FROM    finance_economics_dataset WHERE    stock_index IN ('NASDAQ', 'S&P 500', 'Dow Jones') GROUP BY    month, stock_index ORDER BY    month, stock_index LIMIT 50;
